channel.title: Need a RSPS developer
channel.description:
To whom is reading , Myself and a friend are looking into starting up a Runescape Private Server ( RSPS ) one of which we hope will become a great success.
We are looking at hiring a highly experienced coder ( Java ) someone who can provide proof of previous projects , We fully understand that this could be a very time consuming project.
We will be offering a substantial payment as well as a percentage of all future profits ( assuming that you stay around to add - fix stuff when deemed necessary)
We are intent on gaining a substantial financial income as well as creating a large friendly player community.
We will discuss source etc when we are at that stage.
We are only looking at hiring the utmost experienced and determined coder(s).
Thank you.
Tom.

item.title: Need a RSPS developer
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:
